subject: KYC Update - Address Change
body:
Hello,

I recently moved to a new address and would like to update my KYC information. My new address is:

456 Maple Avenue, Apt 5B
Springfield, CA 90210

I have attached a copy of my utility bill and updated driver's license as proof of address. My account number is ACC-2019-5432.

Please confirm once the update is complete.

Thank you,
Sarah Williams
